entities.name: deathly hallows
entities.description: Deathly Hallows are mentioned as being shown to Hermione by Xenophilius.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is the one who shows Hermione the Deathly Hallows.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is confused and asks for clarification about what Xenophilius is showing her.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is one of the Deathly Hallows mentioned by Xenophilius.

entities.name: resurrection stone
entities.description: The Resurrection Stone is another object that Xenophilius mentions as being part of the Deathly Hallows.

relationships.description: Xenophilius shows Hermione the Deathly Hallows.
Xenophilius mentions the Elder Wand as one of the Deathly Hallows.
